page.title: 17SHOPS
page.content: The local village communities have to fight to keep their amenities alive, shops find it difficult to compete with town supermarkets. The village Post Offices are uneconomical to run, apart from being a social point they also provide vital services especially for the elderly who find it hard to travel the 10 miles to the town banks and shops.Some people rarely enter the more expensive local shop and would rather travel the distance regularly or stock up into their freezers. {EMPLOYMENT} Unemployment is low even though there is very little work locally, not in the villages nor on the farms. People travel to the towns and other large institutions (government and university etc.) a very few commute to London daily (car then train). Workers to London and Cambridge are increasing
